parameters.name: Coverage
parameters.description:
The service location. Valid values:

*   **domestic**: the Chinese mainland
*   **global**: global
*   **overseas**: outside the Chinese mainland

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListUserRatePlanInstances](~~2852398~~) operation. Specify at least one of the instance ID and website ID. If you specify both of them, the instance ID is used.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. If you leave this parameter empty, the system uses the default resource group ID.
